content.description: Climb slab left of the arête.  Might be a downed tree blocking this at the moment.
There might be a hard sit start project to the right of the tree, right of the arête project?
content.location: Right of the tree growing over the boulder???

content.description: Start as for Cumulonimbus and Flying Nimbus on the crimp and sidepull, as for Flying Nimbus traverse the lip to the left instead of topping out straight up and then continue around the corner using a good edge just below the lip of the boulder. Once on that front face use slopers and a good right-hand pinch at the lip to get a high right foot (on the edge used to trav to the front) and then rock up and over on top the top of the boulder. Topout easily the crux of this one.
content.protection: 2-3 pads, the climb traverses and there is a rocky portion of ground in the landing area.
content.location: On the backside of the Clouds rest boulder, this climb starts below its lowest point where it is easy to jump/climb down from and traverses the lip left all the way around the corner.

content.description: Start as for Cumulonimbus on the crimp and sidepull, but instead of topping out straight up traverse the lip to the left and top out by rocking over just before the tree.
content.protection: 2-3 pads, the climb traverses and there is a rocky portion of ground in the landing area.
content.location: On the backside of the Clouds rest boulder, this climb starts below its lowest point where it is easy to jump/climb down from and traverses the lip left.

content.description: Sit start with right hand on good edge and left on sidepull, large left foot underneath you. Pull onto the boulder, bump the left up through more sidepull crimps, righthand goes up to a fat pinch/sloper on the lip and you can then get your feet up and work straight up through another couple of good down pulling edges and a rounded horn up to an easy topout.
content.location: On the backside of the Clouds rest boulder, this climb starts below its lowest point where it is easy to jump/climb down from.

content.description: Stand start to the hard project.
content.location: #1 on the beta photo from a stand

content.description: Start sitting below big overhanging arete with left hand on good crimp and right hand gastoning funky rail. Climb arete to top.
Obscure boulder up and behind the Toulumne boulder.
